title: MD
biography: Kapil Nirmal is an Indian television actor who is best known for his portrayal of Yudhishthir Sisodia in the Star Plus serial Raja Ki Aayegi Baraat.
aiSummary: Nirmal Surya is a epilepsy awareness specialist with an H-index of 29 at Neurology (Member). Has been published in American journal of respiratory cell and molecular biology, Nursing and Health Sciences, Neurological Sciences. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
